Articles.Content:
Hi there, i have a big problem with KSP. After starting a new Ship from Launchpad, the Game crashed as i reached the Muns influence. I started the game new and in the Gamemenu, i wanted to load a Savegame, but nothing happened. Till this time, no savegame can be loaded or will displayed in the game. I started a new career for testing and saved it, restarted the game and this savegame is away too. The Game blinks 1 ztimes and that was it, nothing happen to open my savegames.Hi there, i have a big problem with KSP. After starting a new Ship from Launchpad, the Game crashed as i reached the Muns influence. I started the game new and in the Gamemenu, i wanted to load a Savegame, but nothing happened. Till this time, no savegame can be loaded or will displayed in the game. I started a new career for testing and saved it, restarted the game and this savegame is away too. The Game blinks 1 times and that was it, nothing happen to open my savegames.

Each new career, which i start, is away if i restart the game. I have no idea what i can do to fix this savegame issue.

This problem usually indicates a truncated or otherwise corrupt save file. You can figure out exactly which save file is broken (if you previously had multiple) by opening the console with Alt+F2 before attempting to Resume Game; the error should reference a specific save file. Once you have located the problematic save, you will need to open the save folder and delete the persistent.sfs file. That done, if you have a recent quicksave, you can then rename it to persistent.sfs to recover your save file to that point in time.
Wow thx, it worked, repaired it with an older file from automatic savesystem. Lost only 5 min Playtime, perfect. My 6 weeks career is save.
